title: Love Bites
description: From the gilded excess of hair metal to stripped down grunge, happy-go-lucky ska, to rebellious punk, and regular old hard rock, Love Bites is the story of Rachel Khona's search for love and lust set against the musical landscape of decades past through present. Beginning with the discovery of Appetite for Destruction to the time she met Gwen Stefani, rock music has guided Rachel through the ups and downs of searching for Mr. Right. Or in some cases, Mr. Right Now.
author: Rachel Khona
